name: bitsky
description: Make Life Productive. BitSky is a fast web crawling, web scraping and automation toolbox

TYPEORM_CONNECTION.description: Database connection type. Currently, available values [sqlite, mongodb].

TYPEORM_HOST.description: Database host. Required when your TYPEORM_CONNECTION isn't sqlite. Example: bitsky123.mlab.com

TYPEORM_DATABASE.description: Database name. Required when your TYPEORM_CONNECTION isn't sqlite. Example: bitsky

TASK_TIMEOUT_CHECK_TIME.description: How frequently to check whether Tasks are timeout

RETAILER_STATE_CHECK_TIME.description: How frequently to check Retailer state
